subject: Testing XML and XSLT
msgSnippet: I have a program which generates two files, one an SVG file and the other a simple HTML page. What is the best way to use JUnit to perform the tests? I don t
messageBody:
I have a program which generates two files, one an SVG file and the other a
simple HTML page.

What is the best way to use JUnit to perform the tests?

I don't really like the idea of doing file comparisons and would like some
ideas on how to do this kind of testing

Thanks!
